metadata.title: CVE-2021-36221 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Go before 1.15.15 and 1.16.x before 1.16.7 has a race condition that canlead to a net/http/httputil ReverseProxy panic upon an ErrAbortHandlerabort.

criterions.comment: golang-1.6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.10: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
golang-1.13: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
